data.comment: The match has started at Estadio El Sadar.
Osasuna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick Osasuna.
Enric Gallego for Osasuna gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Atletico have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Osasuna in their own half.
Atletico drives forward and Koke gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Atletico to take a throw-in in Osasuna territory.
In the minute 5, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Can Osasuna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
In Pamplona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 8, In Pamplona Osasuna drive forward through Enric Gallego. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Atletico a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pamplona.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Osasuna.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Osasuna at Estadio El Sadar.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Osasuna throw-in in Atletico's half.
Free kick for Osasuna in their own half.
In the minute 16, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a throw-in for Osasuna, close to Atletico's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Osasuna.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Osasuna.
Atletico advance rapidly upfield but Xavier Estrada Fernandez blows for offside.
In the minute 25, Atletico have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Goal kick for Atletico at Estadio El Sadar.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Osasuna are pushing forward but Facundo Roncaglia's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pamplona.
In the minute 29, Can Osasuna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico's half?
Atletico have a goal kick.
Osasuna have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
In the minute 31, Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Osasuna's half?
Free kick for Atletico in the half of Osasuna.
Throw-in Osasuna.
In the minute 33, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Atletico throw-in in Osasuna's half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in high up the field for Atletico in Pamplona.
In Pamplona Osasuna attack through Ruben Garcia. The finish is off target, however.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Atletico a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Atletico needs to be cautious. Osasuna have an attacking throw-in.
Osasuna to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
Osasuna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Osasuna in the half of Atletico.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Goal kick for Osasuna at Estadio El Sadar.
In the minute 41, Atletico have been given a penalty...
In Pamplona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sergio Herrera (Osasuna) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 43, Joao Felix nets and Atletico now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Throw-in Osasuna.
Can Osasuna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Estadio El Sadar.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Osasuna in their own half.
An attacking Atletico player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Atletico a penalty but Joao Felix misses from 12 yards.
In the minute 48, Joao Felix (Atletico) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Atletico are coming forward and Angel Correa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Osasuna a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Atletico are on the attack at Estadio El Sadar, where Angel Correa is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Free kick for Osasuna in their own half.
In the minute 50, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
The match at Estadio El Sadar has been interrupted briefly for a check on Kieran Trippier, who is down injured.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Atletico’s Kieran Trippier is on his feet again at Estadio El Sadar.
Ball safe as Osasuna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Angel Correa of Atletico smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Atletico.
Ball goes out of play for a Osasuna goal kick.
Joao Felix (Atletico) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 59, Atletico's Vitolo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Osasuna have a goal kick.
Lucas Torro is on a sub for Oier for Osasuna.
In the minute 63, Free kick in a good position for Atletico!
Atletico's Kieran Trippier is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Osasuna close to the penalty box.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the home team in Pamplona.
Throw-in for Atletico in their own half.
Osasuna make their second substitution with Roberto Torres replacing Jony.
Jagoba Arrasate (Osasuna) is making a third substitution, with Enrique Barja replacing Enric Gallego.
In the minute 68, Ante Budimir is replacing Adrian Lopez for the home team.
It's now 0-2 in Pamplona as Joao Felix scores for Atletico.
In the minute 69, Great play from Angel Correa to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Osasuna.
Free kick for Osasuna in the half of Atletico.
In the minute 72, Koke (Atletico) has received a yellow card from Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Corner awarded to Osasuna.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Osasuna throw-in in Atletico's half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Atletico at Estadio El Sadar.
Osasuna to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 76, Free kick Atletico.
In Pamplona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Osasuna have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 79, Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Osasuna at Estadio El Sadar.
Throw-in for Osasuna close to the penalty box.
In the minute 80, Ante Budimir (Osasuna) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Ruben Garcia.
Free kick Atletico.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Osasuna.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Atletico throw-in in Osasuna's half.
Goal kick for Atletico at Estadio El Sadar.
In the minute 84, The home team replace Facundo Roncaglia with Nacho Vidal.
Atletico drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
The away team replace Joao Felix with Lucas Torreira.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pamplona.
Thomas Lemar is replacing Angel Correa for the away team.
Throw-in Osasuna.
In the minute 88, Lucas Torreira puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-3.
Kieran Trippier instrumental with a fine assist.
Atletico needs to be cautious. Osasuna have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Atletico at Estadio El Sadar.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Osasuna in their own half.
Atletico have a goal kick.
Osasuna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Atletico a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Atletico in their own half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez blows to end the match. The final score is 1-3.
At Estadio El Sadar, Marcos Llorente has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Atletico make their third substitution with Felipe replacing Vitolo.
